## Learning R

- [Awesome R Learning Resources](https://github.com/colemanrob/awesome-r-learning-resources) - A well maintained list of great learning resources.
- [Variance Explained](http://varianceexplained.org) - Data exploration, visualization, machine learning.
- [Julia Silge](https://juliasilge.com) - tidy models walk throughs, text analysis

## Digital Govt

- [Teaching Public Service in the Digital Age](https://www.teachingpublicservice.digital/syllabus-index) - Great collection of resources

## Causal Inference
- [Causal Inference Course](https://www.bradyneal.com/causal-inference-course) - Free and well developed causal inference course materials
